channel.title: Ross and Bobbi Johnson on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce
channel.description: Recent content in Ross and Bobbi Johnson on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce

item.title: Status Update – November 10, 2019
item.description: Church, Deacon in Back and Lobby Security. Afterward, we hooked up trailer and loaded bikes, got gas, and went to Paul and Andrea’s for lunch with the Johnsons. Beautiful day for cookout. Kids rode bikes and had an awesome time and didn’t want to leave. Got home and kids still rambunctious and played outside. Kaleena came over and ate with us. I got into a fight with Lesa and left for a couple of hours, had to decide whether I wanted to come back or not, came back for the kids’ sake.

item.title: Status Update – October 27, 2019
item.description: Church, paid for Dillan and Ashley to go to SuperStart. Lesa got mad at Dillan and me for horsing in the pews during the sermon. Ross and Bobbi Johnson’s last day, most likely won’t see them again. They gave kids some Matchbox toy cars. We took them and the Fries out to lunch at El Ranchero Mexican Restaurant in Bloomington, we all had a nice time – even the kids. Always hard to lose good friends and decent people.

item.title: Status Update – September 21, 2019
item.description: Scheduling hell, Lesa had girls day out with Andrea and Bobbie. I was supposed to go fishing and rent boat with Paul and Ross and kids. Ashley had a GS Horseback Riding event. Lesa canceled fishing for me after scheduling fishing for me. Anyway, Ashley woke up with allergic reaction on her face, called doctor, suggested Benadryl, didn’t help like we knew it wouldn’t. Got a plate for the 4Runner, chicken and rabbit feed, and took the kids to lunch at Steak ‘n’ Shake.
